entry.title: https://github.com/lowRISC/ibex
entry.content: Ibex is a small 32 bit RISC-V CPU core, previously known as zero-riscy.

entry.title: https://github.com/lowRISC/opentitan
entry.content: OpenTitan: Open source silicon root of trust

entry.title: https://github.com/openhwgroup/cvfpu
entry.content: Parametric floating-point unit with support for standard RISC-V formats and operations as well as transprecision formats.

entry.title: https://github.com/openhwgroup/cvw
entry.content: CORE-V Wally is a configurable RISC-V Processor associated with RISC-V System-on-Chip Design textbook. Contains a 5-stage pipeline, support for A, B, C, D, F, M and Q extensions, and optional caches, BP, FPU, VM/MMU, AHB, RAMs, and peripherals.

entry.title: https://github.com/pulp-platform/axi
entry.content: AXI SystemVerilog synthesizable IP modules and verification infrastructure for high-performance on-chip communication

entry.title: https://github.com/pulp-platform/riscv-dbg
entry.content: RISC-V Debug Support for our PULP RISC-V Cores
